Soy Oil.description: Primary industrial derivative of soybeans, used in coatings, lubricants, biodiesel, and plastics.

Soy Protein.description: Protein fractions used in adhesives, fibers, and bio-based materials.

Soy Meal.description: Byproduct of oil extraction, used in adhesives, animal feed supplements, and fermentation substrates.

Soy Lecithin.description: Phospholipid mixture used as emulsifier, release agent, and in coatings.

Soy Fiber.description: Cellulosic and dietary fiber fractions used in composites and building materials.

Soy Wax.description: Hydrogenated soy oil used in candles, coatings, and packaging.

Soy Hulls.description: Outer coating of soybeans, used in composites and as fermentation feedstock.

Soy-based Polyols.description: Soy oil-derived polyols for polyurethane foams, coatings, and elastomers.

Soy Isoflavones.description: Phytochemicals with potential industrial applications in nutraceuticals and biomaterials.

Soy Fatty Acids.description: Fatty acid fractions used in surfactants, lubricants, and chemical intermediates.

Glycerol soy-derived.description: Biodiesel byproduct used in chemicals, solvents, and pharmaceuticals.

Soy-based Resins.description: Bio-based resins for composites, coatings, and adhesives.

Whole Soybean.description: Whole bean applications in industrial fermentation and direct processing.

Methyl Soyate.description: Soy oil methyl ester used as industrial solvent, agricultural adjuvant, and cleaning agent.

Epoxidized Soybean Oil.description: Epoxidized soy oil used as PVC plasticizer, heat stabilizer, and coating intermediate.

Phytosterols.description: Plant sterols from soy oil refining used as steroid drug precursors and nutraceuticals.

Azelaic Acid.description: C9 dicarboxylic acid from soy oil ozonolysis used in polymers, lubricants, and cosmetics.

Dimer Fatty Acids.description: Dimerized soy fatty acids for hot-melt adhesives, polyamide resins, and corrosion inhibitors.

Soy Molasses.description: Byproduct of soy protein concentrate production used as fermentation substrate.

Construction & Building Materials.description: Soy-based adhesives, insulation foams, and composite materials for construction.

Automotive & Transportation.description: Soy in vehicle components including foams, lubricants, tires, and composites.

Packaging & Containers.description: Soy-based packaging films, coatings, and biodegradable containers.

Textiles & Fibers.description: Soy protein fibers and textile applications.

Coatings, Paints & Inks.description: Soy oil-based coatings, inks, and paint formulations.

Adhesives & Sealants.description: Soy protein and oil-based adhesives and sealants.

Lubricants & Metalworking Fluids.description: Soy oil-based industrial lubricants and metalworking fluids.

Energy & Biofuels.description: Soy-based biodiesel, renewable fuels, and bioenergy.

Chemicals & Solvents.description: Soy-derived chemical intermediates and green solvents.

Personal Care & Cosmetics.description: Soy in personal care products and cosmetics.

Cleaning Products & Surfactants.description: Soy-based cleaning products and industrial surfactants.

Agriculture.description: Soy-derived agricultural inputs and crop protection.

Electronics.description: Soy in electronic components and dielectric fluids.

Firefighting Foam.description: Soy-based firefighting foams as PFAS replacements.

Rubber & Elastomers.description: Soy oil in rubber compounding and elastomer production.

Pharmaceuticals & Medical.description: Soy-derived ingredients in pharmaceutical formulations, drug delivery systems, and medical nutrition.

Candles & Home Products.description: Soy wax candles, wax melts, and home fragrance products.

Paper & Printing.description: Soy-based printing inks, paper coatings, and paper processing agents.
